content: Created a compact `pyproject.toml` using PEP 621 + Hatchling that pins core scientific/plotting/symbolic/CLI dependencies and includes optional `dev`/`notebooks` extras plus basic Ruff/Mypy/Pytest tool configuration for reproducible experiment runs.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["hatchling>=1.24"]
build-backend = "hatchling.build"

[project]
name = "generated_script_1766435373331"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Reproducible toy numerical/symbolic experiments exploring candidate emergent-classicality frameworks."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "OpenAI Code Interpreter"}]
dependencies = [
  "numpy>=1.24",
  "scipy>=1.10",
  "sympy>=1.12",
  "matplotlib>=3.7",
  "networkx>=3.1",
  "pandas>=2.0",
  "tqdm>=4.66",
  "typer>=0.12",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
  "pytest>=7.4",
  "ruff>=0.4",
  "mypy>=1.8",
]
notebooks = [
  "jupyter>=1.0",
  "ipykernel>=6.29",
]

[project.scripts]
experiments = "experiments.registry:app"

[tool.hatch.build.targets.wheel]
packages = ["src/experiments"]

[tool.ruff]
line-length = 100
target-version = "py310"
lint.select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP"]
lint.ignore = ["E501"]

[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.10"
warn_return_any = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = false
ignore_missing_imports = true

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
addopts = "-q"
testpaths = ["src"]"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created a compact `pyproject.toml` using PEP 621 + Hatchling that pins core scientific/plotting/symbolic/CLI dependencies and includes optional `dev`/`notebooks` extras plus basic Ruff/Mypy/Pytest tool configuration for reproducible experiment runs.
